name: Cropped (itch)
description:
Aliens have come and created crop circles on your farm! Time to show them what you're made of!

Controls:

A & D to move left and right around the crop circle.
W & S to move across paths onto another circle.
P to Punch

This game (v0.1.0) was made in 48 hours as part of the game jam "Jamingtons 2.0!" (https://itch.io/jam/jamingtons...)

Game Jam Notes:

The only imported assets which were made outside of the jam was

  • Rainbow Folders (Unity Editor Only, Has no gameplay effect)
  • Unity's Cross Platform Input Package (Standard assets)

Everything else was made within the 48 hours. This includes the art, scripting, design, sound, music and whatever else I haven't mentioned.
